mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reservation(user_id, res_date , rno, class_sub_no, count) values(#{user_id}, #{res_date}, seq_reservation_rno.nextval, #{class_sub_no}, #{count})
mapper.select: select s.program_sub_no, t.time_no, t.time_start, t.time_end, (p.personnel - s.reserve_count) remain_count from tbl_program_sub s, tbl_class_time t, tbl_program p where s.program_time = t.time_no and p.class_no = s.class_no and s.class_no = #{class_no}

select r.rno, r.res_date, p.class_name, r.count, s.class_no, r.status, c.status_name, m.user_name, m.user_phone, t.time_no, t.time_start, t.time_end from tbl_reservation r, tbl_program p , tbl_program_sub s, tbl_reservation_code c, tbl_member m, tbl_class_time t where r.class_sub_no = s.program_sub_no and s.class_no = p.class_no and r.status = c.status_code and s.program_time = t.time_no and r.user_id = m.user_id order by r.rno
mapper.update: update tbl_reservation set user_name = #{user_name}, user_pw = #{user_pw}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, res_date = #{res_date}, count= = #{count} where user_id = #{user_id}
